Row.Text: A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with a [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Necropolis, and the specific Tjaty received is random. Each Tjaty can only be received once. Cost increases per Tjaty trained.
Activate on the Palace to add +3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture to the Building.
Creates 2 Cavalry Units with +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.
Activate on a Wonder under construction to add 200[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. (On Standard Speed)
Activate on a Wonder under construction to add 250[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. (On Standard Speed)
Activate on a Necropolis to immediately start a [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration.
Activate on a Wonder under construction to add 150[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. (On Standard Speed)
Activate on a Building or Wonder with a Great Work slot to grant a [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Codex called The Maxims of Ptahhotep that grants +3[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science.
Activate on a Wonder to add +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold to all Wonders currently in this Settlement.
Activate on a Wonder to add +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture to all Wonders currently in this Settlement.

A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with an [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Acropolis, and the specific Logios received is random. Each Logios can only be received once. Cost increases per Logios trained.
Activate on an Acropolis to grant 75[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence (On Standard Speed).
Activate on an Academy to add +4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture to the Building.
Activate on a Library to add +3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness to the Building.
Activate on a Building or Wonder with a Great Work slot to grant a [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Codex called Hymn to Aphrodite that grants +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture.
Activate on a Library to add +3[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science to the Building.
Activate on an Acropolis to give this City[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per turn equal to 50% of its[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence yield.
Activate on an Acropolis to immediately trigger a [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration.
Activate on a Palace or City Hall to add +2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence to the Building.
Activate on an Acropolis to give this City[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per turn equal to 50% of its[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence yield.
Activate on an Acropolis to create 2 Hoplites with +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.

A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital with at least 10 [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population, and the specific Shì Dàfū received is random. Each Shì Dàfū can only be received once. Cost increases per Shì Dàfū trained.
Activate on a Constructible with a Great Work Slot to grant a [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Codex called Book of Han that grants +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture.
Activate on the Palace to add +3[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science to the Building.
Activate on a Constructible with a Great Work Slot to grant a [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Codex called Tao Te Ching that grants +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness.
Activate on a Science Building to receive a free random [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Technology.
Activate in the Capital to immediately add 1 [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population.
Activate on the Palace to add +3[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence to the Building.
Activate in the Capital to immediately trigger a [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration.
Activate on an Army Commander to grant it 1 [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Promotion.
Activate in a City to add +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science to all [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Codices in that City.
Activate on an Academy to grant +4[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science to the Building.
The Academy provides +{1_Amount}[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in this City.
The Academy provides +{1_Amount}[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in this City.
Creates 2 Cavalry Units with +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.
Creates a Commander in this City.
The Library provides +{1_Amount}[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in this City.
The Library provides +{1_Amount}[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in this City.
The Palace provides +{Amount}[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in this City.
